title: Movie Theater Tickets
description: You work for a movie theater and you have been asked to create a program that will sell tickets to customers. The tickets will have different prices based on the time of day and the age of the customer. Your task is to create a program that will take in the customer's age and the time of day and return the price of the ticket.

verify.name: Test the implementation of step1.py
verify.hint: Please replace this text with the hint of the verify script
